import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import {signup} from '../api/registerApi' class Signup extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { password : "", user_email :"", location : "", user_name : ""}; } async onSubmit() { const {password,user_email,location,user_name} =this.state const data = { password : password, user_email :user_email, location : location, user_name : user_name}; const res = await signup (data) console.warn("data",res) } render () { return
